message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. It's a reasonable offer considering the declining value of the money. Let's wrap this up quickly.
Your split was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. I'm proposing a more balanced 55/45 split.  The money is losing value quickly, so let's make a deal.
Bob, time is money, literally!  I'll compromise slightly - 52/48.  Let's settle this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
